mapper.sql: id , pid, menu_type, menu_name, perms, sort, menu_channle, menu_path, visiable, create_time, update_time, status
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} and m.status = 0 and rm.status = 0 and u.status = 0 and r.status = 0 ORDER BY m.sort;
SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_org_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.org_id = #{orgId} and m.status = 0 and rm.status = 0 ORDER BY m.sort;
